endpoints.description: Sitecore instance base URL to fetch or push data to

allowWrite.description: Whether writing data to this endpoint is allowed (i.e. to prevent accidental writes to production)

host.description: Base URL to the Sitecore instance to connect to (i.e. http://my.site.core)

authority.description: Base URL to authentication server (IdentityServer, AAD, etc - i.e. https://my.site.core.identityserver - to test, $url/.well-known/openid-configuration should work)

useClientCredentials.description: If true, use client credentials (client id and secret) instead of device (username/password). This is good for CI.

accessToken.description: OAuth access token for this endpoint (use login command to get this)

refreshToken.description: OAuth refresh token for this endpoint (use login command to get this)

clientId.description: OAuth client ID for this endpoint

clientSecret.description: OAuth client secret for this endpoint (when useClientCredentials is true; ignored for device auth mode)

variables.description: Defines variables that are specific to this environment. Variables defined here override any definitions in the root configuration for this environment.
